title: Hide User Story when the User Story is "Done" status
description: As a project manager, I want to hide user stories with "Done" status from the main interface so that I can focus on active work and reduce visual clutter in the mindmap and outline views.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given a user story with status "Done", when viewing the mindmap, then the story node should not be visible
Given a user story with status "Done", when viewing the outline tree, then the story should not appear in the hierarchy
Given a toggle control for "Show Completed Stories", when enabled, then all "Done" stories should become visible again
Given child stories under a "Done" parent, when the parent is hidden, then child stories should remain visible if they are not "Done"

tasks.description: Add filter logic to exclude Done stories from mindmap rendering
Update outline tree to filter out Done stories
Implement toggle control for showing/hiding completed stories
Add localStorage persistence for hide/show preference
